statements: UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET behavior_type = 'click', timestamp = '2022-09-01 10:00:00' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET content_id = 456, timestamp = '2022-09-02 15:30:00' WHERE behavior_type = 'view';
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET content_id = 100, timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE user_id = 123 AND behavior_type = 'like';
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET behavior_type = 'dislike', content_id = 200 WHERE user_id = 456 AND timestamp > '2022-02-01 09:00:00';
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'login' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE content_recommendations SET recommendation_score = 5, recommendation_type = 'popular' WHERE content_id = 456;

UPDATE content_recommendations SET recommendation_score=95, recommendation_type='Updated Recommendation' WHERE content_id=456 AND user_id=789;

UPDATE UserBehaviorPatterns SET behavior_description = 'User behavior updated' WHERE user_id = 123;

UPDATE recommendations SET recommendation_score = 4.5, recommendation_date = '2022-05-20 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 54321 AND content_id = 98765;

UPDATE content SET category = 'new_category', title = 'New Title' WHERE content_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
